commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: I see. So that's what happened with Ayumu.

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: Arguments happen, but shouldn't you go and mend things over sooner rather than later?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: I agree, but I don't know if she's avoiding me or something. I can't seem to get a hold of her.

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: It doesn't look like she's reading messages from us either.

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: I'm sure she just wants to be left alone right now. She'll come around eventually.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Are you sure?

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: It's better not to push things in times like these.

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: Really?

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: Really.

commands.speaker: You
commands.line: I think I understand how Ayumu feels, though.

commands.speaker: Kotori
commands.line: Yeah, me too.

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: You go through a lot when a friend you've known forever develops a blind spot and just throws themselves headlong into something.

commands.speaker: You
commands.line: Absolutely. We've suffered so much over the years.

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: Yes, we really have.

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: What?! But we gained a bunch of volunteers from the impromptu live stream Chika and I did, didn't we?!

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: Uh-huh, that's right. People are saying that our Akihabara stream was legendary!

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: Legendary, you say?

commands.speaker: Kotori
commands.line: Honoka, Chika... You know that live stream could've been disastrous if we hadn't come to your rescue, right?

commands.speaker: You
commands.line: Chika, you're no match for Umi and Kotori!

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: Ahaha...

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: Th-Thank you so very much for what you did...

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: But we really did see an increase in people wanting to help!

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: Chika, I think it's best not to push it right now.

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: Ack. I-I'm sorry. I won't do it again.

commands.speaker: Kotori
commands.line: Honest?

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: Never! Probably... But maaaaaybe sometimes?

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: Honoka!

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Hahaha! You really have suffered so much stress!

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: Indeed. It seems endless at this point.

commands.speaker: You
commands.line: But I just kinda see it as my job, I guess.

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: She will never learn and grow if you continue to let her get away with it, You.

commands.speaker: Kotori
commands.line: You're one to talk, Umi. You always go along with Honoka's antics to the end.

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: W-Well, that's... In any case, you all need to calm down and pay more attention to those around you.

commands.speaker: Honoka, Chika
commands.line: Okaaaaay, we'll be more careful.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Ack... I'll also be more careful.

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: You three need to keep your reckless ways in check, okay?

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: Anyway, while I'm worried about Ayumu, the whole task of gathering volunteers is pretty stressful too.

commands.speaker: Ruby
commands.line: We won't be able to use the Nijigasaki school grounds for the festival if we don't gather enough volunteers by the deadline, right?

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: But trying to gather 1,000 volunteers is an enormous task.

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: It might be an enormous task, but it's the only choice we have.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: I'm in the middle of explaining everything and asking everyone in the club to help out.

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: How many volunteers do we have right now?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Around 250, maybe?

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: We've still got a long way to go.

commands.speaker: Hanayo
commands.line: Wanna all go to the shrine to offer up some prayers?

commands.speaker: Nozomi
commands.line: Praying to the gods is good and all, but how about we also get together and rethink our recruitment strategy?

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: Yes, let's do everything we can!

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: Two heads are better than one, as they say. With the number of heads we have here, it is quite possible we will come up with some great ideas.

commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: Yeah! Let's all think really hard together!

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: That's easy to say, but after thinking about it again, putting together an event really is a difficult task.

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: Honestly, I don't think I took it as seriously as I should've. I regret that.

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: As did I. I thought everything would go a little smoother than it has.

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: Let's reflect on what we did wrong and then move on from there!

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: Yeah, you're right!

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: Let's make a reliable plan so we don't get caught off guard, okay?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Leave it to us! We'll roll our sleeves up and put even more oomph in!

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: That's right! Let us Nijigasaki girls show you what we're really made of!

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: We will all work together and support each other!

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: Yeah, let's do this!

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: But don't take it to heart if things don't work out, okay? It's not like this would mean the end of our school idol careers or anything.

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: Yes, we shouldn't brood about it.

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: Whoa, hey! Why are we already talking about things not working out now? You can cross that bridge when and if you get to it!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: *Laugh* Crossing the bridge or not, I'm gonna throw everything I've got at it!
